T02D3497:150b-1: s'i ta t'a r'a s'a dha nam /
T02D3497:150b-3: sgrol ma dkar mo'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3497:150b-4: 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3497:150b-5: sngon ma bzhin du stong pa nyid la sogs pa'o //
T02D3497:150b-6: de nas sum yig yongs su gyur pa las rin
T02D3497:150b-7: po che sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin gyi ri rab
T02D3497:150b-8: bo // de'i steng du pam yig las padma dkar po'o //
T02D3497:150b-9: de'i steng du aa yig las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D3497:150b-10: de'i steng du h'um yig dkar po yongs su gyur
T02D3497:150b-11: pa las bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma dkar mo
T02D3497:150b-12: spyan gsum pa / phyag bzhi pa //
T02D3497:150b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i dbu rgyan can /
T02D3497:150b-14: sna tshogs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
T02D3497:150b-15: phyag gnyis kyis autpa la'i phyag rgya mdzad pa /
T02D3497:150b-16: phyag g-yas na yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po
T02D3497:150b-17: che dang yang dag par ldan pa'i mchog sbyin gyis
T02D3497:150b-18: sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs
T02D3497:150b-19: par mdzad pa / g-yon na autpa la'i snye ma bsnams pa bsam par bya'o //
T02D3497:150b-20: de'i g-yas phyogs su 'od zer can sku mdog ser
T02D3497:150b-21: mo zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa na bza'
T02D3497:150b-22: sngon po can / phyag gnyis pa /
T02D3497:150b-23: phyag g-yon na mya ngan med pa'i shing dmar po'i yal ga bsnams pa /
T02D3497:150b-24: g-yas na rnga yab dkar po bsnams pa /
T02D3497:150b-25: stod gos dmar pos brgyan pa'o //
T02D3497:150b-26: g-yon phyogs logs su rma bya chen mo pri yam
T02D3497:150b-27: ku'i me tog lta bu ljang gu phyag gnyis pa
T02D3497:150b-28: / g-yon na rma bya'i mjug sgro bsnams pa /
T02D3497:150b-29: g-yas na rnga yab bsnams pa de lta bu'i rnam pa gsal pa la /
T02D3497:150b-30: aom bha ga ba ti t'a re ma ma hri da yam pra bi sha sv'a h'a /
T02D3497:150b-31: zhes pas bdag nyid byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D3497:151a-2: aom na mo t'a re ma no ha ra h'um ha ra sv'a h'a /
